TunableTuple.name: CAS_STORIES
TunableTuple.description: Tuning for the CAS Stories sim-creation flow.

Tunable.name: additional_sims_funds_percentage
Tunable.description: If additional CAS Stories sims are added to a household, this is the percentage of their normal funding to add to the household funds as additonal funding. For instance, if we have 1 sim with a 10,000 simoleon trait and a second sim with a 5,000 simoleon trait and this is tuned to .5, the resulting household income would be 10,000 + .5 * 5,000 = 12,500.

TunableList.name: funds_traits
TunableList.description: Mapping between specific traits and the amount of starting household funds to give to a sim with that trait.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: Reference to the trait.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The household starting funds.

TunableList.name: questions_per_pack
TunableList.description: Mapping between the number of packs available and the number of base game questions and questions per pack that should be asked.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The number of available packs.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: The number of questions that should be asked.

Tunable.name: base_game_questions
Tunable.description: The number of base game questions to ask.

Tunable.name: per_pack_questions
Tunable.description: The number of pack questions to ask per pack.

Tunable.name: silouetted_sim_info
Tunable.description: The SimInfo file to use for the silouetted sim in CAS Stories.

TunableList.name: CAS_ADD_SIM_MENU_DATA
TunableList.description: An ordered mapping of menu data used for the Add Sim portion of CAS.

TunableTuple.name: data
TunableTuple.description: Data associated with an add Sim button in CAS.

TunableEnum.name: action
TunableEnum.description: The action to take when clicking this entry.

Tunable.name: audio_name
Tunable.description: The audio to play when this entry is selected.

TunableList.name: criteria
TunableList.description: Only add this menu item if the criteria are met.

TunableVariant.name: criterion
TunableVariant.description: An element of CAS state to match against.

TunableList.name: active_occult_form
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's active occult form with this list. (This is only if the sim has an occult form active.)

TunableList.name: age
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's age with this list.

TunableList.name: allowed_packs
TunableList.description: Will only be allowed for packs in this list.

TunableList.name: gender
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's gender with this list.

TunableList.name: has_equipped_part
TunableList.description: Compare the current Sim's equipped parts with this list.

Tunable.name: has_paint_layer
Tunable.description: Check if the current sim has a paint layer present. Note: This is currently only valid for pets.

Tunable.name: in_genetics_mode
Tunable.description: Check if genetics mode is currently active.

Tunable.name: is_direct_manip_enabled
Tunable.description: Check if direct manip is enabled for the sim.

Tunable.name: is_fashion_mode
Tunable.description: Check if currently in fashion mode.

Tunable.name: is_full_edit_mode
Tunable.description: Check if full edit mode is enabled for the sim.

Tunable.name: is_mannequin
Tunable.description: Check if the current sim is a mannequin.

Tunable.name: is_new_sim
Tunable.description: Check if this is a newly-made sim.

TunableList.name: occult_type
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's occult type with this list.

TunableList.name: species
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's species with this list.

Tunable.name: exclude_if_matched
Tunable.description: Whether the item this criteria applies to should be excluded instead of included if this criteria is satisfied.

Tunable.name: flair_name
Tunable.description: Flair to apply to this entry (for instance, god rays).

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: The icon for this entry.

Tunable.name: icon_selected
Tunable.description: The icon when this entry is selected.

TunableList.name: limit_genetics_species
TunableList.description: Species in this list will only be allowed through if the action for this entry is GENETICS. This is very likely only going to be used for pet genetics.

TunableList.name: occult_type
TunableList.description: The occult type for this entry, if any.

Tunable.name: parent_index
Tunable.description: The index of the parent entry if this is a child to another entry in the list. 0 if this entry has no parent.

TunableEnum.name: species
TunableEnum.description: The species for this entry. Species.INVALID indicates no preference or it's not relevant to this menu entry.

Tunable.name: tooltip
Tunable.description: The tooltip when hovering over this entry.

TunableEnum.name: tutorial_control_enum
TunableEnum.description: The enum used for tutorial controls. UI_INVALID should be used if this entry has no tutorial control.

Tunable.name: index
Tunable.description: The order in which these entries should be added. 1 is first, 2 is second, etc.

TunableList.name: CAS_COPY_FILTERS
TunableList.description: An Ordered list of copy menu items that will appear in the randomization panel ui in CAS. The list is filtered by the criteria on each menu item.

TunableTuple.description: A copy menu item and its inclusion (and/or exclusion) criteria.

TunableList.name: criteria
TunableList.description: Use this menu item if all of the specified criteria are met.

TunableVariant.name: criterion
TunableVariant.description: An element of CAS state to match against.

TunableList.name: active_occult_form
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's active occult form with this list. (This is only if the sim has an occult form active.)

TunableList.name: age
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's age with this list.

TunableList.name: allowed_packs
TunableList.description: Will only be allowed for packs in this list.

TunableList.name: gender
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's gender with this list.

TunableList.name: has_equipped_part
TunableList.description: Compare the current Sim's equipped parts with this list.

Tunable.name: has_paint_layer
Tunable.description: Check if the current sim has a paint layer present. Note: This is currently only valid for pets.

Tunable.name: in_genetics_mode
Tunable.description: Check if genetics mode is currently active.

Tunable.name: is_direct_manip_enabled
Tunable.description: Check if direct manip is enabled for the sim.

Tunable.name: is_fashion_mode
Tunable.description: Check if currently in fashion mode.

Tunable.name: is_full_edit_mode
Tunable.description: Check if full edit mode is enabled for the sim.

Tunable.name: is_mannequin
Tunable.description: Check if the current sim is a mannequin.

Tunable.name: is_new_sim
Tunable.description: Check if this is a newly-made sim.

TunableList.name: occult_type
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's occult type with this list.

TunableList.name: species
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's species with this list.

Tunable.name: exclude_if_matched
Tunable.description: Whether the item this criteria applies to should be excluded instead of included if this criteria is satisfied.

TunableList.name: flags
TunableList.description: A list of copy flags for this item.

Tunable.name: name
Tunable.description: The name of this menu item displayed in the ui.

TunableList.name: required_flags
TunableList.description: A list of copy flags that are required to be enabled in order for this menu item to be enabled.

TunableList.name: CAS_PROHIBITED_TAGS_BY_MODE
TunableList.description: Any item with any of these tags are filtered out of CAS catalog views for the associated edit mode.

TunableEnum.name: edit_mode
TunableEnum.description: The edit mode that has a restriction.
The tags that are not allowed for the associated edit mode,

TunableList.name: CAS_RANDOMIZE_FILTERS
TunableList.description: An Ordered list of randomization menu items that will appear in the randomization panel ui in CAS. The list is filtered by the criteria on each menu item.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: An integer value used to set the specific order of the menu items in the ui. The lower numbers are displayed first in the ui.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: A randomization menu item and its inclusion (and/or exclusion) criteria.

TunableList.name: criteria
TunableList.description: Use this menu item if all of the specified criteria are met.

TunableVariant.name: criterion
TunableVariant.description: An element of CAS state to match against.

TunableList.name: age

TunableList.description: Will only be allowed for packs in this list.

TunableList.name: gender
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's gender with this list.

TunableList.name: has_equipped_part
TunableList.description: Compare the current Sim's equipped parts with this list.

Tunable.name: has_paint_layer
Tunable.description: Check if the current sim has a paint layer present. Note: This is currently only valid for pets.

Tunable.name: in_genetics_mode
Tunable.description: Check if genetics mode is currently active.

Tunable.name: is_direct_manip_enabled
Tunable.description: Check if direct manip is enabled for the sim.

Tunable.name: is_fashion_mode
Tunable.description: Check if currently in fashion mode.

Tunable.name: is_full_edit_mode
Tunable.description: Check if full edit mode is enabled for the sim.

Tunable.name: is_mannequin
Tunable.description: Check if the current sim is a mannequin.

Tunable.name: is_new_sim
Tunable.description: Check if this is a newly-made sim.

TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's occult type with this list.

TunableList.name: species
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's species with this list.

Tunable.name: exclude_if_matched
Tunable.description: Whether the item this criteria applies to should be excluded instead of included if this criteria is satisfied.

TunableList.name: flags
TunableList.description: A list of randomization flags for this item.

Tunable.name: name
Tunable.description: The name of this menu item displayed in the ui.

TunableList.name: required_flags
TunableList.description: A list of randomization flags that are required to be enabled in order for this menu item to be enabled.

TunableList.name: CAS_SKINTONE_TYPE_FILTERS
TunableList.description: A list of skin tone type buttons data for its filtering

TunableTuple.description: Tuning for branded logo to use.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: Icon to be displayed on the item

Tunable.name: icon_selected
Tunable.description: Icon to be displayed on the item when selected

Tunable.name: tooltip
Tunable.description: Localized name of this type.

TunableList.name: CAS_SPECIES_PAINT_POSES
TunableList.description: A mapping of species type to data that is required for the paint pose ui

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The species type that this entry applies to.

TunableList.name: value
TunableList.description: A list of CasPaintPostTuples

TunableTuple.description: Data required for each UI Paint pose button.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: Icon to be displayed on the button for the pose

Tunable.name: icon_selected
Tunable.description: Icon to be displayed on the button when the pose button is selected

TunableList.name: occults_blacklist
TunableList.description: Pose won't be shown if current occult form is in this list

TunableEnum.name: pose
TunableEnum.description: The pose to play when the button is pressed

TunableList.name: CAS_VOICES_DATA
TunableList.description: A mapping of species type to data required for the personality panel ui.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The species type that this entry applies to.

TunableList.name: value
TunableList.description: A mapping of age type to data required for displaying voices in the ui.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The age that this entry applies to.

TunableList.name: value
TunableList.description: a list of voice data for this species at this age.

TunableTuple.description: data required to display this voice in the ui.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: Icon to be displayed as voice button.

Tunable.name: icon_selected
Tunable.description: Icon to be displayed as voice button when it is selected.

Tunable.name: tooltip
Tunable.description: Localized name of this voice.
